resources.string: The easiest way to order food within IIIT Delhi!
Enter your current location to get stuff delivered to you.
Select from the day\'s canteen menu.
People who are near the canteen/Cdx will pick up the order for you. Exchange our virtual currency Super Coins as delivery charge.
In order to earn Super coins, you need to deliver the stuff for others.
Please use your IIIT Delhi e-mail to Sign In
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Please enter your phone number below.
